name: Systematic Debugging
description: Hypothesis-driven debugging methodology: reproduce, isolate, identify root cause, fix, and verify with regression tests.

examples.prompt: Debug this NullPointerException in the user service
examples.expected_behavior: Traces the null reference through the call stack, identifies the missing null check or uninitialized field, and provides a fix with test

examples.prompt: The API returns 500 intermittently under load
examples.expected_behavior: Forms hypotheses (race condition, resource exhaustion, timeout), systematically tests each, identifies root cause, and suggests fix
